snippet: A proposal to amend the Constitution would restore fairness to American politics by reducing the influence of big money.
abstract: Editorial notes that 48 Democratic senators are sponsoring constitutional amendment to restore congressional control to campaign spending; holds that while amendment is unlikely to pass, senators' willingness to undertake long and difficult effort shows importance they attach to restoring fairness to American politics by limiting influence of big money; acknowledges that amendment is not cure-all, but last resort effort to save American democracy.
lead_paragraph: A proposal to amend the Constitution would restore fairness to American politics by reducing the influence of big money.
